ValidationRule.description: Account and Implementation are required on Resolved for Implementations
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISNEW() = TRUE) || ISCHANGED(Status) ) && ISPICKVAL( Status , "Resolved") && ( $Profile.Name = 'Implementations' || $Profile.Name = 'Lightning Implementations' ) && ( ISBLANK( AccountId ) || ISBLANK( Implementation__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter the "Account" and "Implementation" before Resolving Case
